author: Amy Beth Hanson
title: Meet Crush, the rare orange lobster diverted from dinner plate to aquarium by Denver Broncos fans
text: The Downtown Aquarium in Denver has a new resident — a rare orange lobster that was rescued from a shipment of crustaceans delivered to a Red Lobster restaurant in Pueblo, Colorado. A long-term employee who is a dishwasher and head biscuit maker spotted the bright orange lobster while unpacking a shipment last Friday and alerted restaurant managers, aquarium officials said. The staff named it Crush after the Denver Broncos' legendary Orange Crush defense from 1976 to 1986. Recommended Videos “Myself and many of my team are born and raised Denver Broncos fans, so as soon as we saw that orange color, we knew that Crush would be an excellent representation,” said Kendra Kastendieck, the restaurant's general manager. “And we all want our defensive line to be that good again." When the Pueblo Zoo couldn't take Crush, Kastendieck called the Downtown Aquarium, which she said was interested right away. Kastendieck packed Crush with ice packs in a plastic foam container and delivered it to the aquarium on Wednesday. “As soon as they acclimated him to his quarantine tank at the Denver aquarium, he was very active right off the bat and was really exploring his little area,” Kastendieck said Thursday. Staff had set up a tank with a new generation Denver Broncos helmet on top and an older generation one sitting in the tank “so he can actually climb into it and play around it,” she said. Crush will be examined by a veterinarian and after 30 days in quarantine will be placed in the “Lurks” exhibit that houses other cold water North Atlantic Ocean species, aquarium staff said. “We are thrilled to be able to share this very rare and extraordinary animal with the community and visitors to Colorado,” Ryan Herman, general curator at Denver Downtown Aquarium, said in a statement. Crush was shipped to the Pueblo restaurant from a supplier in Tennessee. It was caught off a coast of Canada, said Kastendieck, but she was unable to confirm which coast. Genetic mutations can lead to lobsters that are orange, blue and yellow. Downtown Aquarium has had one orange lobster previously. The Downtown Aquarium has more than 700 species of fish along with a stingray reef and three Sumatran tigers. ___ Hanson reported from Helena, Montana.

author: Vincent Constant
title: PHOTOS. \"C'\u00e9tait visible \u00e0 l'\u0153il nu !\" : des aurores bor\u00e9ales magnifiques ont illumin\u00e9 le ciel
text: Dans la nuit du 10 octobre au 11 octobre, des aurores boréales ont été observées et photographiées en Bourgogne. Des lueurs roses impressionnantes sont notamment venues illuminer les hauteurs de Santenay en Côte-d'Or. Voici les plus beaux clichés. Le ciel de Bourgogne s'est paré de rose cette nuit. [Des aurores boréales](/bourgogne-franche-comte/doubs/besancon/en-images-une-nuit-historique-les-aurores-boreales-ont-illumine-le-ciel-de-franche-comte-decouvrez-les-plus-belles-photos-2968001.html) ont été photographiées par plusieurs personnes à travers la région. Si la plupart du temps ce phénomène est d'ordinaire visible uniquement à l'aide d'un appareil photo professionnel, certains internautes affirment que les voiles colorés étaient également visibles à l'œil nu ! Des aurores boréales d'un rose éclatant David Duret, photographe amateur de Côte-d'Or a capturé des aurores boréales au-dessus de Viévigne en Côte-d'Or. Après avoir partagé les photos sur Facebook, il décrit sa "nuit de folie" : "Le phénomène a démarré vers 22 h pour s'étendre jusqu'à au moins 2 h 30 avec un pic incroyable vers 1 h 15, heure à laquelle on pouvait voir ces lueurs à l’œil nu ! D'ordinaire, on ne distingue pas grand-chose en dehors du capteur de l'appareil." Marie-Charlotte Rochette et Jérémy Moron aussi, ont assisté à ce spectacle époustouflant. Après avoir immortalisé le ciel de Santenay en Côte-d'Or vers 22 h 30, ils ont même pris la peine de poser devant le spectacle, pour un résultat impressionnant. Jérémy Moron, photographe amateur de 28 ans, a réussi à prendre plusieurs photos dès 20 h ce jeudi. Placé sur le Mont des Trois Croix, sur les hauteurs de Santenay, cet habitant du coin a orienté son objectif vers le nord et a patienté. "Au début, il y avait pas mal de nuages", confie-t-il. "Mais vers 22 h ça s'est dégagé et les couleurs se sont intensifiées alors j'ai appelé ma copine pour qu'elle vienne me rejoindre." Le couple a alors pu observer "à l'œil nu" des couleurs allant du rose au vert. "On voyait même les stries des aurores, c'était impressionnant !" En usant d'un retardataire et d'une exposition longue, le jeune homme a même pu immortaliser des photos avec sa compagne, pour des souvenirs inestimables. Nicolas Drouhin aussi n'a pas raté cette occasion. Le photographe amateur, habitué des clichés bluffants a réussit de superbes images à la Roche de Solutré en Saône-et-Loire. Voir cette publication sur Instagram Un phénomène rare engendré par une tempête solaire Une puissante éruption solaire survenue le 9 octobre est à l'origine de ce spectacle. Si les aurores boréales sont d’ordinaire plus facilement observables dans les pays nordiques, le phénomène tend à se répéter en Bourgogne. Même si, pour le moment, il s'agit toujours d'un évènement très rare. Pour avoir plus de chances d'en observer, il est conseillé de s'éloigner de toute pollution lumineuse et chercher un ciel dégagé. ► À LIRE AUSSI : ["Une période assez incroyable" : pourquoi voit-on autant d'aurores boréales dans le ciel en Bourgogne ?](/bourgogne-franche-comte/bourgogne/une-periode-assez-incroyable-pourquoi-voit-on-autant-d-aurores-boreales-dans-le-ciel-en-bourgogne-2868815.html) Déjà [en mai dernier](/bourgogne-franche-comte/yonne/en-images-c-est-historique-la-bourgogne-illuminee-par-d-incroyables-aurores-boreales-2967986.html), les Bourguignons avaient eu la chance d'observer des aurores boréales impressionnantes dans la région.

author: @elnuevosiglo
title: Sincelejo: prohíben consumo de drogas en espacios públicos | El Nuevo Siglo
text: [Jueves, 25 de Enero de 2024] El consumo de drogas en espacios públicos y entornos escolares quedará prohibido en Sincelejo, según anunció el alcalde Yahir Acuña. Mediante la resolución 0114, definió un perímetro de 200 metros alrededor de instituciones educativas y lugares abiertos al público, en los que estará prohibido el porte, consumo, facilitamiento, distribución, ofrecimiento y comercialización e ingreso de sustancias psicoactivas. Estas restricciones abarcarán tanto la dosis personal como aquellas sustancias que conllevan riesgo de generar dependencia. Además, se especifican las áreas o zonas del espacio público donde estas actividades serán prohibidas, con el objetivo de fortalecer el control y promover un entorno más seguro para la comunidad. [Siga a El Nuevo Siglo en WhatsApp: contenido gratis](https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029Va67qiqCMY0IauxJAF0m) La resolución también detalla que la prohibición se aplicará en instituciones educativas formales, no formales y mixtas de todos los niveles, así como estadios, coliseos, centros deportivos, hoteles, parques, clínicas, centros comerciales, sistema de transporte e iglesias. Esta iniciativa del alcalde Yahir Acuña busca proteger los entornos de esparcimiento frecuentados por las familias sincelejanas, con especial énfasis en la salvaguarda de los niños, niñas y jóvenes. El alcalde subrayó: "Tenemos que recuperar el tejido social y evitar que nuestros niños, niñas y jóvenes caigan en las manos de la droga, que solo destruye vidas". Además, indicó que la medida también tiene como fin proporcionar entornos de esparcimiento seguros en la ciudad. Por otro lado, aquellos que incumplan esta restricción enfrentarán medidas correctivas establecidas en el Código Nacional de Policía, que van desde amonestaciones hasta multas y la posibilidad de la destrucción del bien. Con estas restricciones, el alcalde Yahir Acuña reitera su compromiso con la seguridad y la convivencia ciudadana, en el marco de la recuperación de espacios de esparcimiento como el Parque Santander, la Plaza de Majagual y el Pozo de Majagual.

author: @fox8nola
title: Man celebrates last day of work after 48 years at supermarket chain
text:
WEST DES MOINES, Iowa (KCCI) - For an Iowa man, the start of 2024 will bring a lot of change to his normal routine as he retires from supermarket chain Hy-Vee after almost five decades.
It’s not every day Steve Mick gets chauffeured around, but after 48 years at Hy-Vee, Sunday was his last day and his boss insisted on the special ride to work.
Outside the West Des Moines supermarket was a display celebrating Mick’s years of service.
“That’s amazing,” Mick said. “Wow. It’s about all I can say.”
Inside the store, countless hugs and congratulations from family, friends and former colleagues showed the impact Mick had on the community. He started at Hy-Vee behind the meat counter in 1975 when he was just 16.
“He’s the same person today: extremely nice, extremely thoughtful, willing to help the customers,” longtime colleague Marilyn Cook said.
“He’s been such a hard worker all his life, and today is kind of a bittersweet day for all of us,” said Mick’s daughter, Kerri Driscoll.
Mick worked at different Hy-Vee locations throughout his career, his last being the store in West Des Moines on Jordan Creek Parkway.
“It was just a place that fit for me,” Mick said. “Been a long haul, and it’s been well worth it.”
As the chapter at Hy-Vee comes to an end, the cake at Mick’s party is a hint as to what part of retirement looks like: camping and time in nature with family.
“I’m going to let life happen to me, enjoy every minute of it,” Mick said.
Mick’s co-workers say he will be missed after bringing smiles to people during his nearly five decades on the job.
Copyright 2024 KCCI via CNN Newsource. All rights reserved.

author: facebook.com/lakelewisjr
title: Commanders' Wildcard Adds to Disruptive Defense - Heavy Sports
text:
Heading into the 2025–2026 NFL season, much of the Washington Commanders’ defensive buzz surrounds All-Pro linebackers Bobby Wagner and Frankie Luvu, who bring a wealth of experience and elite production. But a new name is emerging in the background, second-year linebacker Jordan Magee. After a developmental rookie season, Magee now looks primed to carve out a rotational role. The second-year player offers speed, instincts, and physicality that could elevate Washington’s already formidable linebacker unit.
Magee may not be a household name yet, but that could change quickly. His blend of athleticism and hunger makes him a natural fit in Dan Quinn’s aggressive defensive system. While Wagner and Luvu bring veteran reliability, Magee’s energy and growth potential could become a key X-factor in the Commanders’ push for an elite front seven.
Learning from Legends and Gaining Confidence
Washington drafted Magee in the sixth round of the 2024 NFL Draft. Many viewed him as a special-teams contributor and long-term project. But throughout his rookie year, which started with an injury that derailed his early progress, Magee quietly impressed. Coaches love his work ethic, film study habits, and sideline-to-sideline pursuit.
What’s made his leap in Year 2 so promising is the environment around him. Few young linebackers get to learn from two All-Pro talents like Wagner, a future Hall of Famer, and Luvu, one of the most versatile disruptors in the league. Wagner’s ability to diagnose plays and Luvu’s relentless motor have served as on-field blueprints for Magee, who now blends those lessons with his own natural instincts.
After Day 1 of Commanders Training Camp, Magee spoke with NFL Insider and Analyst Lake Lewis Jr. about learning from Wagner and Luvu.
Yes. It’s a blessing to be in the same room as them. Frankie, an All-Pro, and Bobby, a twelve-time All-Pro and first ballot Hall of Famer,” the Temple standout said. “Just to be in a room with those guys is a blessing, but they’re really different in their own ways. For Frankie, he’s a more up-energy, like, pass rush guy. So, you know, taking small steps with him, bringing it into my game, and taking small steps with Bobby, bringing it into my game. You know, with Bobby, I’ve kind of been under his wing for the past year, learning from him. We just worked out early in the morning. So, you know, just following him, seeing what he does, his routine, and try to mimic that, and try to bring that into my whole thing. That’s what I’m trying to do, just taking little things from those guys, because they’re both great players, and they’re future Hall-of-Famers. So, you know, if I can do that, I have a good chance at being in that category. So, you know, just go out there, and just, you know, do my thing.
During offseason practices and minicamp, Magee looked faster, more decisive, and noticeably more confident. Coaches have highlighted his closing speed and awareness in coverage, two areas where Washington needs depth behind its top two starters. As offenses become more reliant on quick passes and versatile backs, linebackers like Magee, who can both hit and cover, become invaluable.
Magee’s growth also opens up rotational flexibility. Quinn and defensive coordinator Joe Whitt Jr. love to rotate their front seven and keep players fresh. With Magee showing readiness to take live reps, the Commanders can ease the load on Wagner and Luvu, especially late in games or down the stretch of the season.
A Depth Piece with Starting Potential
Magee’s impact may begin on special teams, where he already proved to be a consistent contributor in 2024. But his path to greater responsibility lies in his ability to stay disciplined in run fits and offer versatility in sub-packages.
In College, McGee was a tackling machine who showed strong leadership and toughness. That physical identity now has a place on a Commanders’ defense that’s focused on speed and violence. As Washington faces mobile quarterbacks, quick game passing, and modern spread formations, linebackers must be able to think and react without hesitation. Magee brings those traits and adds something else: youthful explosiveness. He runs well, breaks down in space, and brings the type of pop that creates turnovers. In goal-line packages and third-down situations, his burst could disrupt blocking schemes or create mismatches against tight ends and running backs.
If injuries or rest periods force the Commanders to go deeper into their linebacker rotation, Magee is not just a stopgap; he’s a player with real upside. With a full offseason in the strength program and a year of mental reps under his belt, he has positioned himself to be more than a fill-in. He’s knocking on the door of consistent defensive snaps.
Magee may not start the season as a household name, but if his trajectory continues upward, fans will soon know exactly who No. 58 is. As a spark plug behind stars, Magee is the kind of developmental player who could quietly become a crucial piece of a championship-caliber defense.

author: CBN
title: Qual o valor de 'posto que' em 'Que não seja imortal, posto que é chama', do 'Soneto da Fidelidade'?
text: Em a 'Nossa Língua de Todo Dia', professor Pasquale retoma análise do 'Soneto da Fidelidade', de Vinícius de Moraes. Dessa vez ele explica o uso da expressão 'posto que' na frase 'Que não seja imortal posto que é chama'. Para explicar, Pasquale recorre a um trecho de 'Dom Casmurro', de Machado de Assis, e ao poema 'Um boi vê os homens', de Carlos Drummond de Andrade. Ouça o comentário completo: Gosta das análises do professor Pasquale? Confira mais episódios de 'A Nossa Língua de Todo Dia': Ouça já! Qual o valor de 'posto que' em 'Que não seja imortal, posto que é chama', do 'Soneto da Fidelidade'? 12/9/2024 9min Uma leitura de 'Soneto da Felicidade' 11/9/2024 7min 'A esquerda' e 'a direita' ou 'à esquerda' e 'à direita'? Saiba origem dos termos e como usá-los 10/9/2024 12min Concordância verbal: entenda como o verbo concorda com 'Estados Unidos' 9/9/2024 6min Como usar a expressão 'seguir anexo'? 6/9/2024 7min Ver todos os episódios Mais recente Próxima Concordância verbal: entenda como o verbo se flexiona com 'Estados Unidos'

author: Novedades Yucatán
title: Prevén lluvias intensas durante el fin de semana por la onda tropical no. 15
text: Prevén lluvias intensas durante el fin de semana por la onda tropical no. 15 Se espera que las precipitaciones oscilen entre 10 y 40 mm, acompañadas de vientos del norte y noreste. Para este fin de semana se pronostica un aumento en la intensidad de las lluvias, que podrían variar entre 40 y 70 mm debido a la llegada de la onda tropical No. 15, prevista para el domingo. Este fenómeno meteorológico afectará a toda la Península de Yucatán. Sin embargo, hoy el Estado seguirá experimentando un clima caluroso durante las mañanas, con cielos parcialmente nublados y lluvias de moderadas a fuertes por las tardes; se espera que las precipitaciones oscilen entre 10 y 40 mm, acompañadas de vientos del norte y noreste. El meteorólogo Juan Vázquez Montalvo del Comité Institucional para la Atención de Fenómenos Meteorológicos Extremos (Ciafeme) de la Universidad Autónoma de Yucatán (Uady), indicó que las temperaturas máximas previstas para la región oscilarán entre 32 y 34 grados Celsius, en la costa yucateca se espera que varíen entre 31 y 33 grados. En tanto, la sensación térmica que alcanzará hasta los 45 grados, la humedad relativa máxima será del 95%, mientras que la mínima se situará en el 44%. Para Mérida esperamos lluvia ligera con chubascos dispersos entre las 10:00 y 11:00 de la mañana y de intensidad moderada entre las 13:00 y 14:00 horas de la tarde.

author: Ghean Fernandes
title: Vídeo - Kaká Diniz expõe situação delicada envolvendo Simone e não segura a emoção: 'minha esposa...'
text:
O empresário Kaká Diniz, esposo da cantora Simone Mendes, não conseguiu conter a emoção ao expor uma situação delicada envolvendo a cantora após os ataques de ódio direcionados a ela nas redes sociais. Durante uma transmissão ao vivo nesta quarta-feira (30), Kaká revelou que, desde o fim da parceria artística entre Simone e Simaria, sua esposa tem sido alvo de uma série de ataques coordenados, incluindo calúnias, ameaças e difamações.
O empresário afirmou que as ações, muitas delas anônimas, têm causado grande impacto emocional na família, que tenta manter a força diante da violência virtual. Kaká criticou duramente os responsáveis por esses ataques, apontando que eles agem de forma covarde, escondendo-se por trás de perfis falsos e grupos secretos de WhatsApp.
Kaká Diniz fala sobre a situação delicada envolvendo Simone
Segundo Kaká Diniz, as ações têm origem em frustrações pessoais de um grupo de pessoas que, após a separação da dupla, passaram a nutrir ódio contra a artista e sua família. O empresário denunciou que há uma verdadeira quadrilha por trás de mais de 150 postagens negativas, envolvendo dezenas de perfis de diferentes cidades e estados, para destruir a reputação da cantora e afetar sua integridade emocional.
“Criaram postagens sexualizando a minha esposa, criaram postagens sexualizando uma criança de 3 anos, a minha filha, seu bando de covarde. Criaram coisas contra o meu filho”, apontou Kaká Diniz, emocionado ao revelar a situação delicada na web. O empresário reforçou que a situação é grave e que não hesitará em tornar públicas as identidades de quem está por trás dessas ações, prometendo agir para proteger sua esposa e seus filhos de qualquer tentativa de invasão à privacidade e ao respeito.
Marido de Simone manda recado
Encerrando seu desabafo, Kaká Diniz deixou um recado direto aos responsáveis pelos ataques: “Essa família tem um líder, tem um pai, tem um marido. Ninguém fala da minha esposa e dos meus filhos”, disparou o empresário, que recebeu apoio dos fãs da cantora em sua publicação no Instagram.

author: @le_parisien
title: « Discutable sur le plan scientifique », « passéiste » : un spectacle sur l’Histoire de France fait polémique
text:
« Discutable sur le plan scientifique », « passéiste » : un spectacle sur l’Histoire de France fait polémique
Ce spectacle, soutenu par l’exécutif LR de la région Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, débute à Clermont-Ferrand ce samedi. 200 dates sont ensuite prévues dans toute la France.
Un show historique à grand spectacle, « Raconte-moi la France », débute samedi à Clermont-Ferrand avec le soutien de l’exécutif LR de la région Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, ce que regrette l’opposition de gauche qui dénonce une politique culturelle « passéiste ».
« Les Français sont profondément amoureux de leur Histoire » et « notre ambition, c’est de raconter 3 000 ans d’Histoire française en deux heures », a déclaré lors d’une conférence de presse le créateur et producteur du spectacle Bruno Seillier.
« Les grands chapitres de l’Histoire de France »
Cette création réunit 90 artistes, avec plus de 3 000 costumes et accessoires, dans un décor « monumental » de 30 mètres de base et 14 mètres de haut, sur quatre étages de scène : la première est prévue au zénith de Clermont-Ferrand au pied du plateau de Gergovie. 200 dates sont ensuite prévues dans toute la France.
De l’homme de Cro-magnon jusqu’à la Seconde guerre mondiale, le spectacle couvre « les grands chapitres de l’Histoire de France » avec « les grands personnages comme Vercingétorix, Charlemagne, Louis XIV, Napoléon », a souligné Sophie Rotkopf, vice-présidente de la région, en charge de la culture, lors de cette conférence de presse.
Le projet, d’un coût de neuf millions d’euros, est financé à 100% par des fonds privés et remboursé par les entrées, a assuré Bruno Seillier. Le partenariat avec la Région « est vraiment un partenariat de communication », a déclaré Sophie Rotkopf.
505 279 euros atribués par la collectivité
Selon un document révélé par Rue 89, la collectivité a attribué 505 279 euros au spectacle via l’achat d’espaces publicitaires. La Région, qui a confirmé ce montant, finance aussi l’achat de places pour les lycéens à travers le pass région.
La collectivité « assume sa présence sur l’ensemble des communications liées à ce spectacle. Il est exceptionnel qu’un spectacle d’une telle envergure soit lancé dans notre région : cela va donner un coup de projecteur sur tout le territoire et en particulier sur l’Auvergne », a-t-elle indiqué à l’AFP.
Dans un communiqué, l’opposition écologiste a dénoncé « l’approche historique très discutable sur le plan scientifique » de « Raconte-moi la France » et « l’orientation passéiste de la politique culturelle régionale ». « L’an passé », la Région « a refusé d’aider plus de 130 projets culturels en milieu rural. Cette année, elle décide de soutenir lourdement un spectacle privé aux contenus discutables », poursuit-elle.
